feed.title: Yuhan Sun
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Trainee Professional Development Award (TPDA)
entry.content: Awarded at the Society for Neuroscience Annual Meeting for outstanding trainee research and professional development.
entry.summary: Awarded at the Society for Neuroscience Annual Meeting for outstanding trainee research and professional development.

entry.title: BruinLife Scholar
entry.content: Selected as a BruinLife Scholar for academic excellence and contributions to the UCLA community.
entry.summary: Selected as a BruinLife Scholar for academic excellence and contributions to the UCLA community.

entry.title: Dean’s Prize for Excellence in Research

link.title: Dean’s Prize for Excellence in Research

entry.content: Recognized for excellence in research within the UCLA College of Letters and Science.
entry.summary: Recognized for excellence in research within the UCLA College of Letters and Science.

entry.title: Whitcome Undergraduate Research Fellowship
entry.content: Awarded the Whitcome Fellowship in support of undergraduate research in neuroscience.
entry.summary: Awarded the Whitcome Fellowship in support of undergraduate research in neuroscience.

entry.title: Undergraduate Research Fellow Program (URFP) Fellowship
entry.content: Received the URFP Fellowship for promising undergraduate research projects.
entry.summary: Received the URFP Fellowship for promising undergraduate research projects.

entry.title: S.-T. Yau High School Science Award — National Semifinalist, 2nd Place (Chemistry)

link.title: S.-T. Yau High School Science Award — National Semifinalist, 2nd Place (Chemistry)

entry.content: National Semifinalist, 2nd Place in Chemistry Category, awarded by Tsinghua University.
entry.summary: National Semifinalist, 2nd Place in Chemistry Category, awarded by Tsinghua University.

entry.title: Intel International Science and Engineering Fair — 4th Place, Material Science

link.title: Intel International Science and Engineering Fair — 4th Place, Material Science

entry.content: World Finalist, 4th Place in the Material Science Category at the Intel ISEF, Society for Science.
entry.summary: World Finalist, 4th Place in the Material Science Category at the Intel ISEF, Society for Science.
